autoAcceptAllPrompts.description: Say yes to all the prompts from the Storybook CLI migration scripts.

onlyShowListOfCommands.description: Only show the steps that you need to follow in order to migrate. This does NOT make any changes to your code.

noUpgrade.description: Skip upgrading Storybook packages. Only use this option if you are already on version 7, and you do not want the latest beta.

onlyPrepare.description: Only run the Nx scripts that will prepare your Storybook configuration files for the Storybook CLI automigration.

afterMigration.description: Only run the Nx post-migration scripts that make the final adjustments to your workspace.
